  • Method Details

    • editData

      public static java.lang.String editData​(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity, RPGDataType type, int value)
      Edits data derived from RPGDataValued on an entity
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity being targetted
      type - The type being added
      value - The integer being assigned
      Returns:
      A string detailing the success. Mostly used for command output.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the player is null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the data type cannot be found
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if we cannot cast to the right type

    • editData

      Parameters:

      type - The type being added
      value - The integer being assigned
      altValue - The alternate integer being assigned
      Returns:
      A string detailing the success. Mostly used for command output.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the entity is null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the data type cannot be found
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if we cannot cast to the right type

    • editData

      public static java.lang.String editData​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, RPGDataType type, int value)
      Edits data derived from RPGDataValued on an item
      Parameters:
      player - The player being targetted
      item - The item being targetted
      type - The type being added
      value - The integer being assigned
      Returns:
      A string detailing the success. Mostly used for command output.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the item is AIR
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item has not meta
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the data type cannot be found
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if we cannot cast to the right type

    • editData

    • generateLore

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateLore​(org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataContainer data)
      Generates the appropriate lore for the item based on the data contained on it. Any data types that provide an empty (length = 0) string "" will not have their lore added to them.
      Parameters:
      data - The data we're turning into lore
      plugin - the plugin we're drawing from
      Returns:
      an array list of lore or null if its empty
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the plugin is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the data is null

    • init

      public static void init​(AeonRPG plugin)
      Initializes this utility class
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin tied to this class.

    • loadItem

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack loadItem​(java.lang.String path)
      Attempts to save an item to the provided path
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin whose folder we'll be using
      path - The path we'll be saving to
      Returns:
      An itemstack with the values loaded
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null

    • randomizeAttributeUUID

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack randomizeAttributeUUID​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Causes all uuids stored within an item's attributes to be randomized. The goal is to solve an issue where items with the same attribute uuid not stacking effects with each other.
      Parameters:
      item - The itemstack we're modifying
      Returns:
      The modified item stack
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item is null

    • saveItem

      public static void saveItem​(java.lang.String path, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Attempts to save an item to the provided path
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin whose folder we'll be using
      path - The path we'll be saving to
      item - The itemstack we'll be saving
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file path is null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the itemstack is null
      java.io.IOException - if the file isn't saved properly

    • copyData

      public static void copyData​(org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataContainer source, org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataContainer target)
      Copies persistent data between two containers
      Parameters:
      source - The source of the data
      target - The destination of the data
